name: perl-path-tiny

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This module provides a small, fast utility for working with file paths.
It is friendlier to use than File::Spec and provides easy access to
functions from several other core file handling modules. It aims to be
smaller and faster than many alternatives on CPAN, while helping people
do many common things in consistent and less error-prone ways.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: perl-alien-build
dependent_to.description:
This module provides tools for building external (non-CPAN) dependencies
for CPAN. It is mainly designed to be used at install time of a CPAN
client, and work closely with Alien::Base which is used at runtime.

dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-getopt
dependent_to.description: A Moose role for processing command line options

dependent_to.name: perl-alien-build-plugin-download-gitlab
dependent_to.description: Alien::Build plugin to download from GitLab

dependent_to.name: perl-test-file-sharedir
dependent_to.description: Create a Fake ShareDir for your modules for testing.

dependent_to.name: perl-log-dispatch-filerotate
dependent_to.description: Log to Files that Archive/Rotate Themselves
